summary: Rebel against the evil Sickness as you fight your way deeper inside the world of Jack's mind to discover the dark secrets behind his madness, all the way accompanied by your spirit animal in this psychological first-person-shooter/adventure.

name: Jamm
summary: JAMM is a Tabletop RPG map maker that makes it simple and easy to bring your vision to life quickly giving you more time to focus on the story. Make perspective and orthographic maps as well as 3d immersive images in minutes.

name: Jack Move: I.C.E Breaker
summary: Jack Move is a JRPG that features a unique blend of gritty cyberpunk storytelling, turn-based battles, and beautiful modern pixel art. In I.C.E BREAKER you will meet Noa for the first time and learn where her story begins!

name: Jade Dynasty: New Fantasy
summary:
Jade Dynasty: New Fantasy presents the eight sects and classic plot in the popular novel Jade Dynasty. With advanced technology the game not only presents the classic eighteen areas but also expanded the world! The Mortal Realm is within your reach.
In this world there are so many amazing things for you to see! You can ride a sword and fly into the sky or down into the ocean. Wherever you go, you can find something new! The game involved elements, terrains and brand new turn-based combat system, which means every step you take can make a difference!

name: Jasper Vice: Legends Untold
summary: Soar, dive, and explore the floating islands as a young Gryphon in this flying fantasy adventure. Delve into the lore and discover what it means to be a Voyager.

name: Jack & Detective
summary: Find Jack out among us.Players are divided into "Jack the Ripper" and "Detective" and try to guess who is Jack.You cannot talk to other players in this game, so you must deduce who is Jack by relying solely on the actions of each player. Each game takes 10 minutes.

name: Jackal Squad: Classic Shooting
summary: World War II broke out, the Fascists attacked the Allies. Your brothers in arms are hostages behind enemy lines. The Jackal squad has been given a mission to drive an armed jeep into hostile territory in order to rescue and extract prisoners of war. As a soldier of an elite group that has undergone a harsh training regiment to survive in any environment, can you complete this mission and put an end to the war?

name: Jade Wolf
summary: Jade Wolf is a platformer game created and developed by Sedition Games in March 2009. In this game, the player controls the titular white wolf venturing in a world inspired and based on Chiang Mai and Thailand, where the creator lives. The gameplay is largely inspired by Sonic The Hedgehog, as well as the Zelda games to a lesser extent. The player must collect 12 Jade Ornaments, and use their power to send the Standing Apes back to the ancient city from whence they came.

name: Jade Wolf 2
summary: The wolves need your help! Find the 6 magical amulets, to restore communication between the cloud palace and Earth.

name: Japanese Nekosama Escape: The Old Inn
summary: A hot spring inn on a land of mythtery my frinds recommended. Back from bath, I found my room completely different!

name: James Pond: Codename Robocod
summary:
In his second adventure, James Pond must retrieve the toys Dr. Maybe has stolen. Pond has been armed with an Inspector Gadget-style stretch device, which he can use to view higher areas or claw onto ceilings so as to slide across them.

The gameplay takes place across worlds themed around particular types of toys, such as sporting goods, candy, and aircraft. The levels scroll sideways, although a small amount of vertical movement is included. On each level Pond must collect 2 penguins and reach the exit, although there are usually multiple exits and lots of secret areas to explore. After completing each pair of two worlds (each of which has three sub-levels), a boss must be faced.

name: Jaded
summary: Platform and fight your way through mountains and forests to accomplish your purpose as a Jade being. Slow down time using your 360-degree directional dash, and lock on to targets to strike! Fight soldiers and creatures on your quest in this gem of a game.

name: Jawbreaker
summary: A tabletop LCD game based on the homonymous Atari 2600 game.

name: Jawbreaker
summary: LCD game based on the Atari 2600 game Jawbreaker. It was released in 1982.

name: Japanese Nekosama Escape: The Mountain Cottage
summary: I visited a mountain cottage as my friend recommended. While going for a little walk, I unexpectedly fell over the cliff...!!

name: Jamir
summary: Jamir is a free-to-play fast paced sci-fi tactical shooter created by one person. Master your abilities and items to destroy creatures and enemies. Upgrade your character, guns, abilities and items to become the most powerful along the globe.

name: Japanese Romaji Adventure 3D
summary: An RPG where you learn Japanese using romaji (i.e. English letters). It is set in the 1800's and is an epic adventure that will teach you about Japanese history and Japanese language. In a matter of hours you could be speaking Japanese.

name: James Cameron's Avatar: The Game
summary: DS Port of James Cameron's Avatar: The Game is the official video game based on the highly anticipated film James Cameron's Avatar.

name: Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe
summary: Welcome to Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe! Survive and Thrive as one of many lovingly recreated European species.

name: Jamping Fish
summary: All you have to do is control the fish with your keyboard to jump over moving stones, plates, cars and more, and avoid starfish or cats to reach the top of the statue.

name: Jade Order
summary: Return from exile and restore the power balance of a secluded land. Play as an ancient warrior that has been tasked to light the sealed beacons of its millenary Order. Avoid the impending doom and complete 50 different puzzles as you aid the Jade Goddess.

name: Japanese Neko-sama Escape: The Local Train
summary: The Third Japanese Neko-sama Escape series!! Game system This game is an escape-the-room game(mystery-adventure game).

name: Jane & John
summary: A visual novel with several built-in minigames featuring a different kind of erotic story between Jane and John.

name: Jacktus Green: The Fluffy, the Spiky and the Spicy
summary: Chase Guindilla to retrieve your beloved Cattus! Jump, dash, and hook around in this 2.5D platformer. Discover different levels, fight enemies, ride minecarts and meet the bizarre neighbors of Sofrito Town.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Hotel of Tricks
summary: The 4th "Japanese Escape Games" series!!

name: Jack's House
summary: It's a world of wonder and imagination, designed especially for children ages 2-8. From the moment your kids come over to play, they will be filled with delight. First they will meet Jack and truly lovable character who's hapy to show them aroiund. Jack's House uses a point and click format which teached hand-eye coordination. and each click revals a delightful surprise. They will learn the alphabet, color dinosaurs, sing a song, read a bonus storybook and learn about the Solar System, the change of seasons and more!! It is a game filled with joy and wonder for kids and the entire family.

name: Jankirou
summary: Jankirou is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Fairy Tale, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Japanese TeTris
summary: Japanese TeTris is Tetris like you've never seen before - incredibly addictive in stylistic graphics too!

name: Jasper and the City of Lights
summary: Let me tell you a story my friend. It is the journey of Jasper and a fallen star into the whispering forest to find his sister Nora. In the deepest of shadows an ancient spirit is lurking but theres hope shining from the horizon: The City of Lights.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Hospital
summary: The 5th "Japanese Escape Games" series! This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).

name: Jam Gods
summary: Become the superstar you've always wanted to be in an immersive extreme basketball experience like nothing else before. Drain deep threes, dunk from anywhere, swat away shots, catch soaring alley-oops. Are you ready to become the chosen one?

name: Jack Big Chin: Alien Invasion
summary: Save humanity! Help Jack Big Chin defeat the alien invaders, in an action-adventure game with 3D platform elements, where you must improve your weapons and activate cannons to complete your missions.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Retro House
summary: "Japanese Escape Games :The Retro House" is a mystery, adventure games. Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles.

name: Japanese Nekosama: Escape the Sento
summary: The 7th Japanese Escape Games series!! Game system This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).

name: Jackal
summary: Jackal, also distributed under the title of Top Gunner, is an overhead run-and-gun shooter by Konami released as an arcade video game in 1986. The player must maneuver an armed jeep in order to rescue prisoners of war (POWs) trapped in enemy territory.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Fortress Prison
summary: The 8th Japanese Escape Games series!! Game system This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).

name: Jahto: Savior of the Sky
summary: Jahto: Savior of the Sky is a modern 3D platformer, heavily inspired by beloved classics. Our hero 'Jahto', a young owl prince, fights against an ancient evil that has corrupted the sacred sky worlds. With a versatile moveset, lots of items have to be collected, secrets revealed and quests solved.

name: Jaleco Arcade 1
summary: The Jaleco Arcade 1 cartridge for Evercade features 8 great arcade games from Jalecos heyday in the '80s and '90s, including Rod Land, Saint Dragon, E.D.F. Earth Defense Force, Avenging Spirit, 64th Street: A Detective Story, Cybattler, P-47: The Phantom Fighter and The Astyanax

name: Jade's Adventure
summary: Jade's Adventure is a fantasy turn-based strategy game. The player has to become the main character Jade and build an army of various monsters through farming, production, and trading. In limited time and resources, defeat the enemy with various armies!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Mansion of Tricks
summary: Investigate various areas and solve riddles in the Mansion of Tricks. Can you escape from the Mansion?

name: Jackalope
summary: Jackalope - is a psychological horror, with supernatural elements. You have to survive in a dangerous forest and not go crazy, defend yourself from monsters, solve puzzles and be prepared for the worst. You can play Jackalope alone or with your friends (up to 4 people).

name: Jake's Halloween Night
summary:
"It's October 31, follow Jake as he gets ready for a killer Halloween party."

A short horror game inspired by old slasher movies

name: Jank Saves the World
summary: Do you like beautiful games with jetpack filled action, shooting, rolling, spaceships, and breaking? Jank is no longer following the rules there are too many secrets to uncover for this one robot to work alone.

name: Jawbreaker
summary: Lets play hide-and-seek with serial killers. Jawbreaker is a psychological horror game that will have you running, hiding, and fighting to survive a terrifying gang-infested society on the verge of collapse. Though thats not all, once the sun goes down the true fear will begin...

name: Jamal Et MehdiI: The Quest for the iencli
summary: Jamal and Mehdi: the quest for the iencli, is a turn-based Urban RPG. Thus, your adventure will take place in the city of Hell City. You will need to solve puzzles and fight turn-based in order to reach your goal!

name: James Bond Jr.
summary: A handheld LCD game by Systema based on the James Bond Jr. animated series.

name: Jane the Office Slut
summary: You play as Jane as she does her best to keep her job. This inevitably leads to her performing certain sexual acts to avoid being fired, what Jane does is up to you, she can either be a submissive sex-loving slut, a dominatrix or a prude that occasionally does some degrading acts to keep her job.

name: Jasper's Dream
summary: Jasper's Dream is a first person puzzle game set in a techno mystic Egyptian world. Help Jasper, a robot programmed to create games, by solving his mind-bending puzzles. You will also explore an abandonned futuristic pyramid and unravel its many mysteries.

name: Jaws!
summary: Jaws is back and he's scarier than ever in this sea based action game with all the action, suspense and terror that made this movie iconic. Save the defenceless swimmers from the teeth of the mighty shark as he cruises the shores of Amity looking for his next meal!

name: Japanese Goblins
summary: Charming fairy-tale heroes. Puzzle game.

name: Jamie's Mod
summary: After Black Mesa plummeted into the ground 200 years after the incident, it was brought back to life by a group of Blue-Headed men all named "Jamie". Jamie and all his friends now work at the lab, and ironically enough the same exact thing that happened 200 years ago happens again. Even with Gordon Freeman brought back from the dead.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Forbidden Garden
summary: The 10th Japanese Escape Games series!! Game system This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game). *Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and this game goes on. Story There is a place every adventurer talks about.

JaDa Fishin'
summary: JaDa Fishin' is a free relaxing quick-time fishing game. Collect up to 12 different types of fish on this incredible journey.

name: Jacob's Quest
summary: Become a Legend in Jacob's Quest, a JRPG that anyone can pick up and play. Save the four crystals of the world and prevent a vile plot from unfolding. With epic battles and world progression, Jacob's Quest is the RPG of choice.

name: Jam Scrapz Collection
summary: A collection of old Game Jam projects revamped, remastered, and rebooted for commercial and more playable value! More than two handfuls of games to play!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Room Without Doors
summary:
You wake up in a strange room.
Can you solve the tricks and riddles
and escape fromThe room without doors?

name: Jack Jeanne: Limited Edition
summary: Limited Edition of Jack Jeanne for Nintendo Switch.

name: Jacob's Room
summary: Your friend has invited you to hang out, but there isn't actually much to do at his place. Interact with items and talk to Jacob to learn more about him!

name: Jake and the Never Land Pirates
Jack's Pea
summary: A game where you jump up as many platforms as possible.

name: James Pond 2: Codename - RoboCod
summary: James Pond 2: Codename: RoboCod is an unreleased NES port of the game of the same name.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Abandoned Schoolhouse
summary: You have been in an accident and have lost consciousness. When you wake up, you find yourself trapped in an abandoned schoolhouse...

name: Jackie
summary: Play as Jackie, a lost rabbit, as she descends deeper into a strange world with even stranger sights. Uncover your dark past and traverse a land of endless joys and sorrows. When the time comes to accept your fate, you need to be ready for anything.

name: Japanese Dungeon: Learn J-Word
summary:
Are you still trying hard to memorize Japanese words?
Let's learn it in easy.

name: Jacky's Hidden Items
summary:
"Jacky's Hidden Items" is a unique search and find hidden objects game featuring the drawings of the ingenious artist Jacky Jackson in a new interactive hidden objects puzzle experience.
Jacky's drawings are colored black and white with a rare style and humor, each hiding an object, animal or a person which seems to be part of the drawing... but it isn't! Challenge your illusionary brain to see if you can find all the hidden objects on each level.
The game is nothing like the classic "hidden object" games that you already know - download to discover special gameplay, story, art, and design which makes it a truly unique and original brain teasers puzzle game unlike any other.
The game's concept is simple and lovely and suits all ages - from kids to adults alike. But dont let this fool you, Jackys Hidden Items will require you to solve challenging mind teasing levels in a clever and rewarding experience as youve never encountered before.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Room with Sturdy Door
summary: You wake up in a strange room. Solve the tricks and riddles and open the sturdy door. Can you escape from sturdy door?

name: Jalebi: A Desi Adda
summary: Lets play all your favorite games  Word Search , Ludo , Snakes and Ladders , Quiz , Word Hunt and 4 Letters games in one single pack. Indias first-ever game center, Jalebi  A Word Game now becomes Jalebi  A Desi Adda with 6 games in 1 pack. Now play word search , Quiz , Word Hunt and 4 letters Word puzzle games in your own language (English, Hindi, Gujarati, Marathi, Bangla / Bengali, Odia, Malayalam, Kannada, Tamil and Telugu) and also you can play Ludo , Snake & Ladder with localized UI.

name: Jan Jaka Jan
summary:
Jan Jaka Jan is a mahjong game in its core, the majority of the gameplay dedicated to mahjong matches (two- as well as four-people) against a variety of opponents. The player can navigate the protagonist around the top-down town and enter various locations, which are viewed from first-person perspective.

The player is also able to buy items to increase his parameters during mahjong matches and encounters of sexual nature.

Cut scenes occur before and after mahjong games, and many matches and other events are dictated by the story. Defeating a female mahjong opponent usually leads to cut scenes that depict nudity and sexual situations.

name: Jam Above Jam Below
summary: Witz and Doobz on their adventure to make a video game through seven different mini-games and funny cartoon cutscenes!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Light and Mirror Room
summary:
Explore the mysterious floor that exists in a certain building and solve the mystery.
Can you escape Light and Mirror Room?

name: Javelin Masters 3
summary:
The great Old School Track & Field gameplay has finally been reinvented on touch screen. Javelin Masters has gone through a ground breaking renewal, and now there is more everything! More Goodies, more Super Skill, more levels and more fun! This is Maybe the most addicting game ever!!
Now you can throw Javelin in Helsinki, Los Angeles and Rio! The total score counts in league. Start playing now and learn to be a Javelin Master together with your thrower! Throwing technique is easy to learn but hard to master.

name: Janken Samurai
summary: Work your way through the ranks (1st Dan, 5th Dan, and 10th Dan) in the arena. Bring those skills to the life and death Shikatsu mode and compete on the online leaderboard against players from around the world.

name: Jack & Kenne
summary: Jack and Kenne is a Beat up, which takes place in a comic book, the player will control an Alligator named Jack and he intends to save Kenne the Rabbit, she was kidnapped by Marcos the Deer!! Jack will have to go from page to page facing Marcos' gang to save Kenne.

name: James: The Circus Zebra
summary: Fly through the air across tightropes, trampolines and trapezes as James the Zebra takes to the big top! Two minigames can be unlocked after completing the main game once and stay unlocked. Compete for the best online hi-scores!

name: Jam League Basketball
summary:
Grab a basketball and slam-dunk like never before!
Play everything from traditional Team Matches to more personal Hotspot games. Play against the computer or online and face random challengers. Better yet, play in Practice Mode to goof around and get better!

name: Jak 3: The Journey Back Gold Edition
summary: This is the final version of "Jak 3 The Journey Back" fangame made by The-Mercenary back in 2005

name: Jadoraki
summary: Experience this virtual reality adventure and become the best Trappist magician. Will you be able to?

name: Jazzy the Frog Goes Home for the Holidays
summary: Froggin in a winter wonderland

name: Jables's Adventure
summary: Jables's Adventure is a casual platforming adventure game staring a young boy named Jables. One day an odd squid appears on his head an claims that Jables is the hero. The boy accepts his new title and sets out on an adventure filled with wild lumberjacks, burrowing cacti, and random facts about fruit.

name: James Bond 007: Everything or Nothing
summary: Game Boy Advance port of James Bond 007: Everything or Nothing.

name: JarataireRPG
summary: Defeat the demon king with a monster girl as a companion!

name: Jack the Knight Adventures 2
summary:
An unprecedented touch reaches you: The Adventures of Jack Knight
Jack, this brave knight of whom all great heroes are inspired ...
You're the only one who can help Jack in this adventure !!!
You will help him to overcome Fear, loneliness, brave a thousand dangers to conquer the ultimate goal: Love !!

name: JanKen Battle Arena
summary:
JanKen Battle Arena offers players a novel and unique gaming experience that revolves around the old classic Rock, Paper and Scissors mechanic combined with some fighting game element and sprinkled with Social and RPG elements.
Furthermore, challenge fellow JanKen masters around the world into a battle over the internet. Better yet, invite your friends to JanKen Battle Arena to duel and claim the bragging rights to be the better JanKen master.

name: Jamie
summary: A secret gets uncovered. Will your journey into that secret uncover your deepest desires ? Follow Jamie, an ordinary shy college student, explore his feminine side and see how his girlfriend Sarah copes with these changes and her own explorations.

name: Japanese Nekosama Games: The Outlaws
summary:
Get back the stolen canned cat food
And Save cats' food crisis!

name: Janes Hotel: New story - Collectors Edition
summary: The long-awaited reboot of Janes Hotel is here. Jane is ready to start new hotels. Start with a small hotel and go further. Three fully upgradable hotels are awaiting.

name: Jazz Jackrabbit CD-ROM
summary:
A CD-ROM version titled "Jazz Jackrabbit CD" was released on November 28, 1994, containing all six original episodes, as well as 3 additional ones known as "The Lost Episodes" listed as episodes A, B, and C. In episode C, there is a secret level with Jazz in the form of a lizard.

This game is playable directly from the CD-ROM and includes 30 incredible new levels and new bonus stage selector! These are the toughest Jazz levels with the hottest graphics we've ever done. Are you up to the challenge?

If you like fun and action, then you're sure to love Jazz Jackrabbit CD-ROM no matter what age you are!

name: Japanese Rail Sim: Operating the Meitetsu Line
summary: A railway operating game that puts you behind the controls of a train in Japan on the Nagoya Meitetsu Railway! Take on and experience the role of a professional train operator and challenge yourself to this high-speed, FMV game.

name: Jane Austen's 8-bit Adventure
summary: Play as Jane Austen, English novelist, in this 2D platforming adventure. Explore 8-bit England, fight enemies with your quill, and confront characters from Jane Austen's novels!

name: Jackpot
summary: Jackpot is a casual game. After starting the game, it has five wheels to turn. When the wheel stops, the icon stopped at the winning line matches the winning pattern, and the player will get the winning amount indicated by the winning pattern.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Prison Underground
summary: Solve riddles and break out from a huge underground facility!

name: JanduSoft Games Bundle Vol. 1
summary: 4 thrilling games, 1 unbeatable bundle!

name: Javier
summary: Help Javier on his journey to "El Dorado", a city made of gold, in this super platform game with hundreds of challenging and addictive platform screens. See the reasons for his ambition and question his decisions with him.

name: James Bond 007: Nightfire
summary:
Step into the shoes of the worlds most famous secret agent in James Bond 007: Nightfire for the Game Boy Advance. This thrilling action-adventure game plunges you into a globe-trotting mission filled with espionage, high-tech gadgets, and explosive action.

Navigate through 10 challenging levels set in exotic locations, from the snowy peaks of the Austrian Alps to the depths of the South Pacific. Utilize Bond's signature arsenal of gadgets and weapons to outsmart enemies and complete your objectives. With a mix of first-person shooting, stealth, and puzzle-solving gameplay, each mission offers a unique and immersive experience.

Engage in intense shootouts and undertake covert operations to uncover a sinister plot threatening global security. The games intuitive controls and detailed graphics make for an engaging handheld adventure that captures the essence of the James Bond universe.

Challenge your friends in multiplayer mode, where you can test your skills in various competitive scenarios. With its captivating story, diverse gameplay, and iconic Bond elements, James Bond 007: Nightfire for the Game Boy Advance delivers a compelling spy experience that you can enjoy on the go. Ready your gadgets and save the world, Agent 007!

name: James Bond 007: From Russia with Love
James is Bananas
summary: A double game mechanic, classic platformer and runner, free the banana village from the evil king gorilla by punching and breaking stuff but halfway each level, gear up, it's time to shoot some gummy bears!

name: Jagged Alliance 3: Tactical Edition
summary:
Introducing the Jagged Alliance 3 Tactical Edition!
This comprehensive kit is housed in a sturdy and waterproof case, ensuring your gear remains safe and dry. The Tactical Belt with a Belt Pouch provides quick and easy access to your essential items, while the A.I.M. pin showcases your allegiance to the cause.

Get to know the characters of Jagged Alliance with a set of 36 character cards, each showcasing their professions and personalities. As you strategize and plan your next move, immerse yourself in the game's atmosphere with the official soundtrack on CD. With the Jagged Alliance 3 Tactical Edition, you'll be fully prepared to take on whatever challenges come your way!

Here's the full overview:
- The Game on disc in a limited Media Book
- Outdoor case, 100% water- and dustproof & IP67 certified
-- Outer dimensions: 258 x 243 x 118 mm
-- Inner dimensions: 235 x 180 x 106 mm
- Heavy Duty Tactical Belt for your pants
- Tactical Belt Pouch for your gadgets
- A.I.M. Pin
- Set of 36 Character Cards
- Original Soundtrack on disc

This item is worldwide limited to 750 orders.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The House
summary: The owner of a house gave a warm welcome to me who got lost. I fell asleep and woke up.

name: Jacob Jazz's The Bus
summary: A short horror story epilogue of Tamarindo's Freaking Dinner, the upcoming sequel to Baobabs Mausoleum.

name: Java Saga
summary: Order up! Join Mornin Jo and DCaff, the mischievous mixologist duo, on their daily grind as baristas in Suburb City! Keep a healthy work/fight balance as you serve customers and take down the dastardly cronies of T.E.A. Inc in Turn-Based combat in this zany Action RPG!

name: Japanese Nekosama Escape: The Sweets Shop
summary: I was having good time in a friend-recommended sweets shop. I found myself in a big trouble

name: Jacksepticeye's 1 Million Subscriber YouTube Party Massacre
summary:
Dedicated to one of the best YouTubers ever: Jacksepticeye and his fans!
Hope you have fun... LIKE A BOSS!

name: Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets
summary: Survival Horror in first person where you must manage your ammunition well, explore varied scenarios and face nightmarish beings, while investigating the macabre experiments with children, the result of a mind unhinged by madness and family loss.

name: JAM: Jets Aliens Missiles
summary: The Aliens have invaded. Take to the skies and defend the colonies with the most advanced Jets at your fingertips. Battle against waves of enemies and their giant bosses. Upgrade your favourite weapon, or equip a different one for the next mission. Add on special modules to beef up your Jet. Get the highest score multiplier, challenge your friends, and beat others around the world.

name: Jailbreak: The Ultimate Escape
summary: Immerse yourself in a captivating journey through the world of incarceration in "Jailbreak: The Ultimate Escape," an exciting and intriguing visual novel game.

name: Jake's Apple Harvest
summary: A Sokoban game where you have to help Jake pick his apples.

name: Japanese Style Tien Gow
summary: "Tien Gow" is a game exclusively for four players using 32 tiles. This game, which is said to have various local rules, has been adjusted to "Japanese Style Tien gow". Tiles are played based on the 8 tiles dealt, and the last player to play a strong tile wins.

name: Jake Everest 2: Gunung Padang The Unseen Civilization
summary: Embark on another epic journey with adventurer and archaeologist Jake Everest! His latest endeavor leads him to a mysterious object inscribed with ancient runes! He boards a plane to investigate the connection when he recognizes matching runes at the Gunung Padang archaeological site. His efforts alongside the archaeological team will lead them to discover lost secrets beyond anything they ever imagined! Come along for a match-3 journey for all time!

name: Jake Everest: Wakanga The Unseen Civilization
summary: Renowned archaeologist Jake Everest has found that recovering stolen and lost artifacts is a rewarding use of his skill and expertise. His good deeds have earned him a fantastic reputation worldwide, and many have called upon him for help. His latest case takes Jake to a small mining colony in Papua where a mysterious plane crash nearby has caused unrest in the workers and is disrupting operations. Can you help Jake unravel the mystery and return peace to this small civilization? Adventure awaits!

name: Jarpug
summary: Jarpug is a JRPG about a pug with a jar on her head. Help Pug and her friends explore a 3D platformer world and fight in turn-based RPG battles. Designed for VR and flat screens, either way is a great way to play! Explore the magical, fantastic world of the modern dog.

name: Jaden & Jasmine: Lost Memories
summary: It's been exactly one month since Jaden Black was shot and betrayed by Jasmine Miles. Did she complete her mission? Well in Lost Memories you not only find that out, but you find out what Harmony's motive was. This game follows the events of the first game Jaden & Jasmine: The Curse of Deception.

name: Jank Cube VR
summary: Jank Cube is a fun VR physics sandbox filled to the brim with cool unique objects for you to interact with using the fully physically simulated player rig in maps made from the ground up for VR.

name: Jamboy: A Jelly-cious Hero
summary: Jamboy and Billy are devoured by a giant and now they have to escape from its guts! Explore the giant's intestines as you defeat food monsters in this frantic, multi-genre game and go on a stomach-churning adventure!

name: Jazz Smash
summary:
Tap to Smash!
Hit everything and enjoy the sweet music of destruction
Level up to unlock more items and new bats

name: Jackpot Words
summary: Create the right word combos and win huge payouts. The more coins you win, the higher you rise!

name: Jackpot Jubilee
summary:
Jackpot Jubilee is a single player slot machine game.

The shareware version of the game has a single, traditional, three reel fruit machine with a single pay-line whereas the full registered version has three differently themed machines and a reel hold option. The game screen shows the machine being played in the centre while to the right is the player's stack of coins, the player clicks on a coin to transfer it to the machine so that they can play. An unusual feature of this game is the way cash is paid out, if/when a player wins and collects their cash the coin stack on the right is updated immediately while the coins collected do a little dance across the bottom of the screen before eventually disappearing.

name: Janet DeMornay is a Slumlord (and a witch)
summary: Live the anxieties and horrors of what it is to be a renter in a world run by landlords. and your landlord is a witch.

name: Jamal Jones: In Judgment of Evil
summary: Jamal Jones Trilogy is a compilation of levels created during the Doomkid's 20 Years Mapping Contest held at the Doomworld Forums. This was a community project dedicated to Doomkid's 20th anniversary as a mapper.

name: Jamal Jones: One Man Jury!
summary: Jamal Jones Trilogy is a compilation of levels created during the Doomkid's 20 Years Mapping Contest held at the Doomworld Forums. This was a community project dedicated to Doomkid's 20th anniversary as a mapper.

name: Jamal Jones: Hell's Executioner
summary: "Jamal Jones: Hell's Executioner" is the third and final episode of the Jamal Jones Trilogy, a community-driven megawad for Doom II created during Doomkids 20 Years Mapping Contest. Featuring 20 maps plus 2 secret levels, this episode follows Jamal Jones as he battles through hellish landscapes to stop an alien scourge infecting humanity. The game includes custom monsters, upgraded weapons, and a gritty sci-fi backstory.

name: Jack Dragon
summary: Jack Dragon is a retro love letter to 80s arcade videogaming. Collect all of the gem pieces to progress to the next level. Avoid touching the nasties. Collect the snowflake power up to freeze enemies in place (you are an ice dragon, after all!). Just jump, hover and collect! Sounds easy, right?

name: Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets - Prologue
summary: In this prologue you will step into the shoes of little Eddie, a 12 year old boy who goes to the amusement park with his parents until what would be a fun day out turns into a nightmare. Experience the terrifying atmosphere of what awaits you in Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets!

name: Jacob's Quest: Voyage
summary: The quest continues in Jacob's Quest : Voyage! Join Kaiden and Jacob on their voyage across the sea islands on thier search for legendary treasure. A grim plot unfolds...

name: Japanese Rural Life Adventure
summary: Experience countryside living in Japanese Rural Life Adventure. "View the cherry blossoms in the spring, attend the festival in the summer, eat roasted sweet potatoes in the fall, hear the temple bell ring in winter, and then it's time for the first shrine visit of the New Year."

name: Jammo
summary: This was an individual project to learn about game development. The game is a third person shooter with some platforming. As you progress through the levels, you will be able to access an array of guns and abilities to help through the game.

name: Jackpot 3
summary: Jackpot 3 is a casual game. Before starting the game, you need to bet first. After the bet, the small ball will start to turn again. When the small ball stops on a certain number, that number is the winning number.

name: Jackpot 2
summary: Jackpot 2 is a casual game. After starting the game, it has three wheels to turn. When the wheel stops, the icon stopped at the winning line matches the winning pattern, and the player will get the winning amount indicated by the winning pattern.

name: Jagot
summary: Net Yaroze Tetris-like game.

name: Jakers! Kart Racing
summary: Race with friends in this awesome racing game! Battle in 12 different characters in 16 different tracks! Play with friends in split-screen multiplayer, and use the funny bonus features.

name: JAPP: Just Another Precise Platformer
summary: A mouse only 2D precise plateformer who will challenge you.

name: Jasei no In: The Serpent's Lust
summary: Jasei no In: The Serpent's Lust is a short, linear game with a strong narrative. It tells a story adapted from a Japanese classic collection of supernatural and paranormal stories called Ugetsu Monogatari. This particular story is a very popular one in Japan, and has gone through many adaptations since its initial creation around 1776.

name: Jaws of Destruction
summary: Jaws of Destruction is a set of 11 vanilla maps I made in an effort to get better at making easier combat and to mess around with vanilla textures. I've aimed for a difficulty curve similar to Scythe, where the first couple of maps are pretty easy but it ramps up near the end. The maps generally take between 5-10 minutes to complete, and are very gameplay-focused. The maps are of various themes - techbases, outdoor valleys, small cities, floating hell fortresses - to name four.

name: Janken Game Acchi Muite Hoi!
summary:
A Janken (rock-paper-scissors) simulator based off the Acchi Muite Hoi! variation of the game, where the player must win a Janken match then correctly guess which direction their opponent will look.

The game's cabinet utilizes a unique control setup, with a large joystick with two buttons on it; holding both buttons chooses rock, a single button chooses scissors, and no buttons held chooses paper. The player can pick between four different opponents, with a meter at the top of the screen filling up whenever the player guesses the opponents moves right. Once the meter is full the opponent is defeated and the next in line challenges the player.

name: Jack Nicklaus Cyber Golf
summary: An unreleased game for the Atari Jaguar.

name: Japan Train Models: JR East Edition
summary: Build, view, and run realistic reproductions of trains in your own railway space! Japan Train Models is a model train puzzle and layout crafting game for model train fans that allows you to create "Train Models" and "Scenery" just like a puzzle.

name: Jawbreak
summary: Fairly large idbase map with a lot of button pressing.

name: Jabuti Adventures
summary: Jabuti Adventures is a platform game about a turtle, whose basket of eggs disappeared due to a brief oversight, and now she needs your help to get them back.

name: Ja-in
summary:
This game is a horror game.
Contains threatening and cruel depictions.
It also contains vulgar and disrespectful expressions.

name: JailBreaker
summary: A punishing, one-button platformer about escaping prison. Test your skills and intellect as you ascend a tower of hand-crafted challenges. Jump, fly, slide up walls, float in bubbles and perform somersaults; all with the press of a single button. Reach the paramount. Reach.

name: Jacks or Better
summary: Video poker for Atari 7800

name: Jasper's Island
summary: Help the lighthouse keeper and his cat to caretake a mysterious island in this pawsome hand-drawn platformer.

name: Japanese Milf
summary: Welcome to the Japanese Milf game, it is a game for adults created for virtual reality.

name: Jax: History Repeats Itself
summary: Jax: History Repeats Itself is an exciting horror game. Inspired by other animatronic-mascot-horror games, this game follows the story of Ernel, a young man hired as a security guard, and his adventure throughout his mandatory 5 nights at Jax's Burgers.

name: James' Fun House: Episode 1
summary: You are a member of an elite strike team employed by the Japanese Americans Against Anime (J.A.A.A). Your mission is to prevent James the Dark Messiah of Anime aka. Jami Kun from releasing real life anime upon the universe. You will infiltrate James' stronghold (The Fun House), combat his cult of anime worshippers and alien allies, rescue hostages, and put an end to the threat of James forever.

name: Japan Train Models: JR West Edition
summary: Japan Train Models second edition features trains from JR West Japan! Build, view, and run realistic reproductions of trains in your own railway space!

name: Jamie Inside
summary:
You've kidnapped a girl and sudden guests arrive at your house.
Distract and smooth talk them, so your visitors doesn't get bored or suspicious.
Don't let anyone find out what's inside your wardrobe!

name: Jaded
summary: Jaded is a large dark techbase slaughtermap by lunchlunch influenced by Fractured Worlds, Miasma, Magnolia, Abandon, Occula, and Newt. It was a runner-up at the 2023 Cacowards.

name: Jack 3 the Future
summary: Jack 3 the Future is the threequel Jack To The Future, and sees the return of the personalized, home-built time machine! When a mysterious force causes Jack's YouTube account to be demonetized the moment he prepares to upload his new video, he sets off on a grand, WACKY journey across dimensions!

name: Ja'afar's nightmare
summary: Ja'afar is a little kid who is been through an accident lately ... a car accident ... he survived with all his family members for sure but the accident affected him and for the first time of his life he experiences a weird but unique nightmare ... you have to reach the end of this nightmare.

name: Jagainu-kun
summary: "Jagainu-kun" is a music picture book game (a heartwarming dance that enhances the sense of rhythm). Choose story mode when playing for the first time. As the story goes on, the dance begins with a certain trigger. There are choices in the middle of the story, and the dance songs and the characters you meet will change depending on how you proceed. At first, the purpose is to select various routes and collect characters and dances. When you finish the story, the result will be reflected and you can make your own picture book, you can read it in "picture book mode", and you can also enjoy dancing with the songs and characters collected on the way. Unlike traditional music games, there are no commands, so it's simple, easy to remember, and easy to get used to.

name: Jankyuusei: Cosplay Paradise
summary: The main character is Tsumorou, a Gutara university student who is scheduled to graduate next spring. The major is the teacher's egg in the teaching process. The time for practical training is finally approaching for the protagonist who has been a student. However, I wanted to practice teaching differently from others, so I decided to go to two schools and do each for a week. How can we make this training fruitful ... So the hero wondered. I wanted to make a club by making the best use of mahjong, which I am good at, and build a relationship of trust with the students. If you can't get the trust in your area of expertise, then the hero isn't a teacher. Will there be a demon or a snake? Okite-breaking educational training is about to begin! A dream mahjong battle with 12 characters, straddling the two worlds of the two major elf titles, "Classmate" and "Lower Classmate"! There are two game modes, a "free match mode" where you can enjoy mahjong in earnest with two or four players, and a "story mode" where you can make the other girl cosplay in various ways if you win the game. The cosplay screen scrolls all over! You can see the girl's slightly embarrassing facial expressions and gestures. If you clear "Story Mode", you can proceed to "Interleague Play" where you play mahjong with the characters of the two schools. Cosplay that cannot be seen in story mode is added.

name: Jammin' With Mario
summary:
Jammin' With Mario is a 2006 McDonald's browser game that was made as a part of the September 2006 Mario Happy Meal promotion. The game was supposedly a music game that taught the player how to play the Mario theme with their keyboard.

As of 2025, no gameplay or builds of the game have resurfaced online and no archives for the swf files are indexed on the Wayback Machine.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Police Office
summary:
You wake up to find yourself alone in the police office
Can you solve riddles
and mysteries and get out of the place

name: Jack and Casie Demake
summary:
This is a mouse controlled real-time inventory management game, think of it as Attache Case from Resident Evil but things are happening at the same time as you're trying organize it.

It is a demake of the original game by Alex Sian aka Shoutscion.

name: Jack Dragon and the Stone of Peace
summary: Jack Dragon is a retro love letter to classic 80's and 90's arcade games. Avoid nasties, jump on platforms, glide around the screen and collect gems! Sounds easy, right?

name: J and the Sewer World
summary: J accidentally kicks a ball, sending it into the manhole. Determined to recover it, he decides to enter the sewer. However, upon exploring the place, he realizes that the ball is not where he imagined, leading him into a restless search throughout the sewer.

name: Japan Train Models: JR Kyushu Edition
summary: Japan Train Models third edition features trains from JR Kyushu Japan! Japan Train Models is a model train puzzle and layout crafting game for model train fans that allows you to create "Train Models" and "Scenery" just like a puzzle.

name: Jack and Bursh
summary: Jack and Bursh is a Roguelike challenge game that combines magic, action, and shooting elements. Players will play various characters with abilities and constantly challenge their limits in a different world!

name: Jacks or Better Video Poker
summary: A homebrew Atari 8-bit version of the Jacks or better variant of video poker, programmed in 10 lines of code.

name: Jack Frost
summary: You and your partner can turn the world into a winter wonderland!

name: Jam Scrapz Collection: Valentide! II
summary: Your mission is simple: kill as many humans as possible before the time runs out.

name: James Bond 007: Nightfire
summary: The PC version of James Bond 007: Nightfire was developed by Gearbox Software while Eurocom developed the home console version. It is mostly the same except for the removal of driving sections used in home console versions and some other minor modifications to the single player and multiplayer modes.

name: James Bond Jr.
summary: An adaptation of the animated TV series, it differs from the SNES version as it is a side-scrolling shooter with puzzle-solving elements.

name: Jail Escape Plan VR
summary: Launch the escape plan step by step and break out to prove your innocence in this VR prison-themed open-world escape game!

name: Jack Styler
summary: Former FBI agent and fishing enthusiast, faces an alien-zombie apocalypse after a virus escapes from NASA. Determined to rescue his wife, he defies the FBI and embarks alone to confront the threat. An epic rescue mission filled with action and suspense!

name: Jak and Daxter: The Lost Frontier
summary:
A port of Jak and Daxter: The Lost Frontier, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters. The game was originally released in 2009 as the sixth and final game in the Jak and Daxter series. The player assumes the role of Jak, the angst-ridden hero enhanced by his exposure to Light and Dark Eco.

When their world begins to run out of Eco, Jak and Keira travel to the edge of the world in search of the ancient Precursor machinery that could reverse the planet's decline. They're not the only interested factions out on the Brink, however; Jak must contend with Sky Pirates while struggling to control his own Eco powers.

name: Japan Train Models: JR Freight Edition
summary: Japan Train Models 4th edition features trains from JR Freight Japan! Japan Train Models is a model train puzzle and layout crafting game for model train fans that allows you to create "Train Models" and "Scenery" just like a puzzle.

name: Jam Scrapz Collection: The Minesweeper
summary: One private; no guns; just your wits and trusty mine detector. Your mission is to clear a path through the minefields in the Great Desert. In most levels, you will have to find a mine detector to clear the mines, or carefully navigate through the field and avoid triggering any mines.

name: Jak the Chicken
summary: Adds over 18 levels and 900+ collectibles to the game and new powerups and adventures!

name: Jam Talk
summary: It tells the story of a developer's very early beginnings and what video games mean to him.

name: Jagmatch
summary: Jagmatch is an Atari Jaguar homebrew in which the player has to match Atari computers and consoles to games considered most iconic for each system. Essentially, it requires good short-term memory, but also solid long-term memory as far as Atari gaming history is concerned! To reveal a tile, press A on the controller.

name: JASBIAC
summary: A daily game where the player have to guess the genres of three albums by just their cover art

name: Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy
summary: A remastered version of Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy, featuring 720p HD visuals and stereoscopic 3D functionality.

name: Jak II
summary: A remastered version of Jak II, featuring 720p HD visuals and stereoscopic 3D functionality.

name: Jak 3
summary: A remastered version of Jak 3, featuring 720p HD visuals and stereoscopic 3D functionality.

name: Java Journey
summary: Embark on a caffeine-fueled escapade! Play as a brave coffee cup reclaiming stolen treasures from tea slimes. Navigate charming landscapes, overcome obstacles, and solve puzzles. Join the whimsical adventure and taste victory!

name: Jack Mason: Ace Attorney
summary: We play as Jack Mason, an old friend of Phoenix Wright that traveled to his country to finally meet him, after a long time and finishing his law studies. He was told to rendezvous in an unusual place: a courtroom lobby? And, apparently, there's also a trial today? What? A certain Larry Butz was arrested for car theft and murder!? But he doesn't even own a license!

name: Jade Legends: Immortal Realm
summary: Jade Legends: Immortal Realm is a new MMORPG with gods and demons-based theme, offering a variety of well-designed team events. No longer do you have to face the world alone! Whether to become a demon or a god The choice is in your hands

name: Jam Jump
summary: Jam Jump is an action-platformer adventure where you guide a young knight through challenging trials, battling hordes of enemies, and navigating treacherous islands with agility and skill.

name: Jaro Adventures
summary: Jaro adventures is a 2d action/adventure platformer. You play as a character Jaro and through levels try to defeat enemies that get in your way. Try to collect as many coins as those will buy you character upgrades.

name: Janko
summary: Explore Janko's a popular restaurant established in the 80's that mysteriously closed down in the 2010's. You will have to run and hide or fight the danger that lies beneath.

name: Jaw Evolution
summary: Evolve your jaw by tapping the screen and improve your looksmax to be the best.

name: Jade Base
summary: This level is a sequel to the Alien Planet. Duke arrives at moon of the planet Jade.

name: Japanese House Exploration
summary: Japanese House Explorationis a first-person puzzle horror adventure game set in a traditional Japanese house. You explore a house that is both eerie and nostalgic. To find a dear friend.

name: Jab Juggernauts
summary: Step into the ring with our exhilarating boxing game! Bringing every punch and knockout to life. Master your skills, earn achievements, and rise to the top. Whether you're a casual gamer or a boxing enthusiast, this game promises action-packed fun and endless challenges!

name: Jade Guardian
summary: Jade Guardian - You take on the role of an unusual guardian made from precious jade who goes on a dangerous adventure to return stolen magical signs.

name: Jazz Out
summary: Jazz Out is a short, blood-pumping speedrunning FPS platformer where you use your enemies as your platforms! You'll punch and uppercut your enemies, make them fly, and teleport on top of them to keep up your combo. Bust out from the prison, perfect your escape by playing again and again!

name: Jalecolle Famicom Ver. Pinball Quest
summary: Introducing JALECOlle Famicom Ver. a project to release a series of Jaleco's Famicom titles! The first title is "Pinball Quest"!

name: Jalecolle Famicom Ver. Yokai Club
summary: Introducing JALECOlle a project to release a series of Jaleco's Famicom titles!. The second release is "Yokai Club"!

name: Jamango!
summary: Jamango! is a new gaming platform that enables anyone to create, and play user-generated worlds. Our mission is to unlock imagination, and empower the next generation of game creators.

name: Japaritale
summary: Welcome to JAPARITALE, a crossover fan-game between the 2017 anime "Kemono Friends" and the hit RPG "UNDERTALE". One day, a human named KABAN, a long-lost child of the Park, randomly shows up in the Savannah Area. Fallen by a few vines on her path, she realizes the importance of dangers set afoot in this foreign land.

name: Jack in the Box
summary: Your son found an imaginary friend. But you have no idea what terrors are you about to witness...

name: James: Masquerade Ball
summary: This mini-game revolves around the choices you make. However in this story, they only affect things in the short term as this one chapter book neither draws information from other books nor does it feed information into any of them. This walkthrough is made to assist others in helping them make the choice for the game that they want. Good luck and happy playing!

name: Jazz Dungeon
summary: Jazz mod of famous Pixel Dungeon

name: Jammer Dash
summary: Jammer Dash is a free rhythm 2D game in which you move and destroy objects on beat made for Windows and Linux! Inspired by many awesome games such as Muse Dash, Geometry Dash and osu!. Made in Unity and C#.

name: Jawaker
summary: Jawaker is the hub of card games! It features Trix, Tarneeb, Estimation, Hokm, Basra, Baloot, AlKout, Hand and many more!

name: Japanese Rail Sim: Hakone Town of Natural Beauty and Hot Springs
summary:
A Japanese Train Operating Simulator Featuring Real Footage!
Operate one of Japan's most famous mountain railways!

name: JawshRPG
summary: Jawsh RPG is a fangame made for Jawsh and his fans a while ago.

name: Jack & Bob Remastered
summary: Jack&Bob Remastered is supposed to demonstrate an alternative dimension of Sonic The Hedgehog. The game is based off Sonic 1 and 2.

name: Janosik 2: Prologue
summary:
Pick up the mantle of the plucky maiden getting ready for her date night that is unceremoniously interrupted by the dastardly duo of Countess Bathory and Baron de Blonde in this prologue to the colourful Janosik 2 retro action-platformer

Janosik 2: Prologue is an introduction to "Janosik 2", presenting a separate story that takes place right before the events of the main game.

name: Jalecolle Famicom Ver. Bio Warrior Dan: The Increaser War
summary: JALECOlle Famicom Ver. continues with back-to-back releases of Jaleco's Famicom titles! The third installment is Bio Warrior DAN The Increaser War!

name: Jak & Daxter: The Lost Levels
summary: The Lost Levels of Jak and Daxter was a java-based web browser game. The legend was that it was the original vision of the Jak and Daxter series, or at least The Precursor Legacy, developed by Gil Acheron in the 1990s and was previously unpublished.

name: Jack of Clubs
summary: Play golf, fight robots, and explore an 18-hole course as Jack, a pilot stranded on a recently-abandoned island resort. Discover secrets and complete challenges to earn items that improve your golf game. Unravel the mystery of the island in pursuit of your golf ball across a huge, continuous course.

name: Jantei Monogatari 3: Saver Angels
summary:
The events of Saver Angels take place after those described in the previous installment of the series, when peace on Earth has already been restored thanks to the efforts of Divan and Marie. Three cosmic spirits have lost their way in space and have to descend onto Earth, taking corporeal form. They enter the bodies of three young women who died recently: one in a traffic accident, another from disease, and the third one - a ten-year-old girl - after committing suicide. All three were avid mahjong players, and all three are now revived and endowed with mysterious mahjong powers. A special Mahjong Academy opens, and the Saver Angels (as the group begins calling itself) is ready to defeat any aliens and demons in that ancient Chinese game.

Saver Angels restores adventure elements that were absent from the previous game, and even enhances them. The player is now able to move in first-person perspective by pointing and clicking on a spot on the screen. Exploring locations, the player triggers scenes, which in turn lead to mahjong games. A special "mahjong mode" allows the player to choose an opponent from the story mode and challenge her (or him) to a mahjong match right away.

name: Jata: The Bee
summary: The Jata is a native bee of the Atlantic Forest. It must fulfill its duty to pollinate flowers and collect pollen and nectar to feed the hive. During the mission, some enemies will appear: spiders hanging from their webs, lemon bees raiding the hive, and a large spider, the Queen, who must be stopped.

name: Jasmine
summary: Jasmine was originally announced in 2011, but was cancelled in 2015. However, in 2024, it was announced that development would resume.

name: Jail Escape
summary:
Jail Escape is a Half-Life 2 mod based off the television show "Prison Break". It somewhat follows the environments of the show. The developer made this mod to learn how to use different programs, such as Valve Hammer Editor and Maya.

Features:
- 1 new weapon
- 9 new maps
- Some new props and textures
- 30-60 min. playing time (depending on you skill level)

name: Japanese Salaryman
summary: Welcome to your new job as an employee of METTA Inc! Follow Issei's adventure as he attempts to escape an ever-spiraling debt. Hack, fight, persuade, and work your way to freedom. Remember employee, the truth is in overtime!

name: James Bond: Who Wants to Live Again?
Jackpot Slots
summary: Jackpot Slots takes players on a wild ride to the casino for an irresistible Vegas experience! Packed with endless themed machines, fun and exciting bonus games, players can enjoy hours of slots action.

name: Jaethoria
summary: 2D Pixel Art Old School MMORPG

name: Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy
summary: A port of Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Janken Horn
summary: Janken Horn is a "Rock Paper Scissors" card game. When a simple luck testing game suddenly becomes a strategy game, you will understand. Why does it make you think so much when all you need to do is to pick one from Rock/Paper/Scissors?

name: Jamie Quest
summary: Ok so basically there's this Jamie named Jamie and he lives with other Jamies but they all vanish in the middle of the night randomly so now he has to find them.

name: Jahmong
summary:
Jahmong is a Sega Dreamcast online mahjong game developed and published by Visit. Released exclusively in Japan in August 2000,

Voice recognition mahjong game. It's a hot game with a voice recognition system like never before, with increased luck depending on the size of your voice.

Play against strong enemies all over the country at Gourmet Mode. From Hokkaido in the north to Kyushu in the south, around the country, get all the local specialties!!

name: Jailbreak Assault
summary: In Jailbreak Assault, you're a prisoner on a daring mission to break free. Start with a key and a baton, outwit guards, destroy documents, and disable security systems. Arm yourself for the ultimate challenge: escaping the heavily fortified perimeter.

name: Jackal
summary: Execute ultra-violent raids in retro 1970s hotels. Master precision and timing to take out bad guys in unforgiving top-down close-combat. No two playthroughs are alike with stackable gameplay mutators and randomly generated rooms.

name: JaleOlle Famicom Ver. Pizza Pop!
summary: The project "JALECOlle Famicom Ver.," releasing consecutive Famicom titles from Jaleco, is here! The fifth release is " PIZZA POP!"

name: JaleOlle Famicom Ver. Saiyuuki World
summary:
The project "JALECOlle Famicom Ver." continues to release Jaleco's Famicom titles one after another!
The 4th release is "Saiyuuki World"!

name: JaygiWare
summary: After spending some time on his own, Jaygi decided to create his own game after hearing that the game industry was booming. Play over 10 microgames using your keyboard and mouse. Take a crack at it on Endless and get the best high score in Jaygi's game.

name: Jaghund Armoured Organ Delivery Service
summary: Since the MAW Lojackers, a group of low-tech anarchists lost control of their insect horde all of society has crumbled into a battle of survival. You have one mission, and one only; you must stay alive to deliver the heart. Travis, the CEO of Orbital Biotech Deliveries, requires a heart transplant and you are the last functional drone capable of completing such a request. The Lojackers will stop at nothing to capture your cargo. Use what power you can gather to charge up any of Fujisaki Corps bots you might find.

name: Jack Street
summary: Jack Street is a dark 2D platformer. The short adventure with horror elements is inspired by cartoons of the 90s and 2000s

name: Jaguar Suns
summary: Race through 15 progressive levels in this SNES/SEGA style 90's retro speed-run platformer.

name: Jar Head Cauldron
summary: Fight monsters from the other side using magical items and weapons crafted in world in order to succeed. Use In World Crafting to upgrade weapons and solve puzzles in order to help save your dismembered brothers and sisters by completing the necromantic ritual before their souls are lost forever.

name: Jan Ken Pro!
summary: What if Jan Ken Po was a Sport?

name: Japan Mahjong
summary: Japanese mahjong.

name: Jailbirds
summary: Despite his hellish prison cell and the constant suffering, Felix the good giant always seeks the bright side of life. His bullet-proof serenity infuriates the vicious Chief-Warden who has sworn to uncover the inmate's secret and eradicate his happiness once and for all.

name: Jacksmith: Weapons and Warriors
summary: Fire up the forge and craft your finest weapons in Jacksmith: Weapons and Warriors, a reforged adventure! Equip the local warriors with custom swords, bows, shields and more in your hands-on blacksmith shop. Follow the soldiers into battle as you push onward toward the evil wizard Dudley!

name: Jaleco Sports: Bases Loaded
summary: Bases Loaded brings classic baseball action back! Featuring a unique behind-the-pitcher view, 12 teams, arcade-style gameplay, and intense umpire disputes, this NES & SNES favorite delivers fast-paced fun. Play a full season or a quick gamestep up to the plate and swing for the fences today!

name: Jackie's Tapes
summary: A set of three favorite tapes of the villain Cry of Fear: Epilogue. Learn the Doctor's story during the events of Epilogue in three expansion packs. Explore the burned-out asylum for answers in SINNER, fight in an abandoned hotel in EVICTION and try to stop Jackie in THE MARTYR.

name: Jawbreaker
summary:
Atari 2600 Port of "Jawbreaker".

Because of technical limitations, Atari 2600 Jawbreaker is not a Pac-Man clone and is different than the Atari 8-bit game. A rough sketch of the 2600 game was used as the basis for new computer versions from programmers other than Harris. The new game was, confusingly, sold as both Jawbreaker and Jawbreaker II and was not as successful as the original.

name: Jaro TCG
summary: Jaro TCG is a digital trading card game simulator where players can build decks, and engage in strategic battles using a fully customizable card system. Set in a rich original universe, Jaro TCG offers immersive mechanics, full card collection, and multiplayer duels designed to recreate the feel of a physical card gamedigitally. Whether you're testing new strategies, or playing with friends, Jaro TCG is the perfect sandbox for card game enthusiasts.

name: Jams
summary: JAMs is a clicker game with Steam items themed around art and music, served in jars.

name: Japanese Psycho
summary: Stop the invaders and save the city in this dynamic arena third-person shooter. The city has no hope, there is only a crazy girl.

name: Japan Trip
summary: Prepare to be swept away by the enchanting allure of Tokyo's nightlife, where neon lights illuminate the path to unexpected encounters and unforgettable experiences.

name: Jar
summary: Jar is a clicker game, wait for the balls to fill the whole jar and click on it to make new balls appear.

name: Jack Barau
summary: A parade of endangered baby petrels, a soft-hearted pirate Help JACK BARAU save them before it's too late!

name: Jalecolle Famicom Ver. Magic John & Totally RAD
summary: The project 'JALECOlle Famicom Ver.' is a series of consecutive releases of JALECO Famicom titles! The 6th release is 'Magic John & Totally RAD'!

name: Japan to Go, Please!
summary: Accompany Tally on her journey through Japan. There she will not only meet friendly Yokai natives but also take part in a competition.

name: Jansei Gakuen: Chrono Magic
summary: Chrono Magic is an one-on-one powerup-laden riichi mahjong eroge for the PSP that takes place in a magic school.

name: Jamjam
summary:
Bouncy Jelly Adventure!
Jump with precision, shine with style!

name: Jawbone Hollow
summary: We may be a small team, but we sure as hell have passion and drive. This single-player horror experience in a long-abandoned gold mine will make you go insane, wandering endlessly until death finally finds you. Misery awaits all who enter Jawbone Hollow. Do you think you can survive?

name: Jaden's Nether Expansion
summary:
Jaden's Nether Expansion is a vanilla friendly mod which aims to Expand the entire Nether Dimension adding various new content and as well as overhauling existing vanilla concepts, this project is evergrowing and is constantly being updated so prepare yourself for the biggest nether mod yet.

It started out as a humble texture pack but has turned into fully fleshed out mod for Forge 1.20.1+

name: Javelin Masters 2
summary:
Maybe the most addicting game ever! Start playing now and become the ultimate Javelin Master!
The good old Track & Field gameplay has finally been reinvented on touch screen. Swipe your finger FAST back and forth between step buttons to run. Throw exactly at the right time for the best possible throw.

name: Jason: Coming of Age
summary: Play as a young man of 25 exploring love, temptations, and the mysterious power of attraction he possesses. Dive into an erotic, intense, and unpredictable world where every choice you make will shape your destiny.

name: Jackie Hart: Headhunter
summary: An urban fantasy 2D point & click adventure set in Taipei, where the supernatural lurks beneath reality. You play as a paranormal investigator with abilities of her own. Unravel a brutal case of human sacrifice, piece together the clues, interview witnesses and try to keep your headliterally.

name: Jack the Ripper: Hunter Clan
summary: A tough 2D top-down shooter inspired by Enter the Gungeon and Hunt: Showdown. Cleanse the fog-shrouded streets of Whitechapel, 19th-century LondonJack the Rippers old hunting groundby tracking and eliminating the nightmarish creatures that roam there.

name: Jackplot
summary:
Jackplot was born during an internal game jam at Typing Monke. The idea was simple but captivating, and after validating the concept, we decided to expand it into a full-fledged project.

However, just a week into development, a game eerily similar to ours surfaced. Instead of competing with an existing title, we chose to pivot to a fresh idea. But rather than let the work wed done go to waste, were sharing Jackplot here on Itch.io as a snapshot of our creative journey.

name: Jalecolle Famicom Ver. The Last Ninja
summary: The project 'JALECOlle Famicom Ver.' is a series of consecutive releases of JALECO Famicom titles! This time, a + Special Ninja Mission: The Last Ninja!

name: Jail Dice: Roll to Break
summary: As the last pilot aboard the dice-shaped combat machine [ Dice-Rover ], destroy threatening objects with exhilarating action. Power up your Dice-Rover enough to find and destroy the ultimate target, [ JAIL DICE ].

name: Jaleco Sports: Goal!
summary: Experience the ultimate soccer showdown! Featuring 24 different teams and intense arcade-style gameplay, these original NES & SNES favorites are back to deliver fast-paced football fun. Play a quick match or complete for the Cupdon your kit and step onto the pitch today!

name: Jake Hunter Detective Story: Memories of the Past
Jake Hunter Detective Story: Legend of the Demon Princess
Jake Hunter Detective Story: For Love
Jake Hunter Detective Story: Four Seasons
Jake Hunter Detective Story: Ghost of the Dusk
Jawless Fishtank
summary: Explore raising your very own Sacabambaspis in the casual fish tank idler. Save coins and feed fish various foods, sparking a various set of reactions. Name your Sacabambaspis and watch them grow before your eyes.

name: Jason Maxx
summary: A man has fallen to his death in Metro City. Mysterious circumstances. Luckily, edgy 90s detective Jason Maxx is on the case. The city is dark, the suspects are zany, and the graphics are Y2K-crusty. Explore, interrogate. Can Jason solve the mystery, even when absurdity takes over?

name: Jaws of Hell
summary: A psychological boomer shooter set before The Hive Pandemic. Play as Clarkex-farmer, husband, and future bounty hunterwho escapes to Mars after losing everything. But when alien tech surfaces and visions of your ex-wife Angela pull you into the Hive, reality begins to fracture.

name: Jake Hunter Unleashed 1: The Death of an Anthropologist
Jake Hunter Unleashed 2: A Is for Angel
Jake Hunter Unleashed 4: Behind Closed Doors
Jake Hunter Unleashed!: School Festival - Locked Office Case
Jade Spring
summary: Relax, potter, and build in Jade Spring, a small Guild Wars 2 decorating and homesteading fan game.

name: Japanese Love
summary: Japanese Love is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Janitori
summary: You are a janitor working on a night shift at the museum. Your task is to clean and restore its exhibits and dusty rooms. Janitori blends satisfying simulation with chilling horror and puzzle-solving mechanics, as you unfold a dark mystery and try not to disturb what lurks in the shadows.

name: Jack Jeanne 2
summary: A sequel to Jack Jeanne that was announced for the first game's 3rd anniversary.

name: Jampa Buggys
summary: Jampa Buggys is a fast-paced local multiplayer racing game set on the breathtaking beaches of Paraba, Brazil. Race through thrilling tracks, face exciting challenges, and immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture! Perfect for friends and family, with simple controls and endless fun!

name: Japan Stigmatized Property
summary: Can you endure until morning Monitor Japan's stigmatized properties and report any paranormal activity If you miss a report or make repeated mistakes

name: Jalecolle Famicom Ver. Saiyuuki World II: The Demon God of Heaven - & Whomp'em
summary: JALECOlle Famicom Ver. brings back classic Jaleco titles! Vol. 7: Saiyuuki World II - The Demon God of Heaven - & WHOMP'EM

name: Jackpoison
summary: This game is a combination of slot and battle RPG!You eat mushrooms and control slots,You can accumulate coins to unlock skills!Rescue the fairies from the bosses who abuse the power of mushrooms!

name: Jacob's Ladder
summary: Jacobs Ladder is a haunting first-person puzzler where YOU are the solution. Swap bodies and stack puzzle pieces to please The Maker. Question the nature of the soul and earn your humanity - before its too late.

name: Japanese Fun: J64
summary: Learn Japanese kana & Kanji with fun games, achievements, and writing practice!

name: Jack & Detectives: Black Magic Expansion
summary: Mad Resonance, Judging Sorcery! New roles, "Occultist," "Elite Jack," and "Elite Jack Maniac" appear! A new battle between the collaboration of Jack's side and the sorcery to stop it!

name: Jaesbich-ui Haengseong
summary: is an adventure game where you meet the Big Dipper, a star that grants wishes, and save the planet that has turned gray.

name: Jackroid
summary: Originally developed as a birthday gift for my nephew, Jackroid is a heartfelt indie game that blends classic action-platforming with Metroid-style exploration. After several requests and growing interest, Ive decided to bring Jackroid to Steam. Freeas a thank you to everyone whos supported me.

name: Jack and the Beanstalk: A Hidden Story
summary: A game inspired by the original fairy tale "Jack and the Beanstalk." Jack, living in a war-torn village, receives a mysterious bean from a witch. The next day, Jack climbs the beanstalk growing in his yard, where he discovers a mysterious beanstalk castle.

name: Janklady
summary: You were once a noble lady of a castle, living peacefullyor so it should have been.When you awoke, all that remained was a desolate wasteland. You must crawl out from your underground shelter and head toward the promised place.

name: Jai Kali
summary: It is a story about attaining the power of Goddess Jai Kali while accomplishing self-redemption.

name: Jack
summary: Find all the pieces of candy to save your village from the entity called "Jack". But beware, Jack's friends seek to release him by stopping you.

name: Jasper Redds vs The Ares Belt
summary: Experience intense, fast-paced action as you dodge enemy fire, collect Xsteel scrap, and upgrade powerful ship systems. Navigate across beautiful expanses of the galaxy in levels filled with challenging foes and epic boss battles.

name: Jack's 510 Racing
summary: Jack's 510 Racing is an open world arcade driver set on nine connecting islands. Earn points by racing on the streets, surviving UFOs and police, or causing mayhem in death races inspired by the cult classic movie. Use points to upgrade, customize, and buy new cars.

name: Jane Austen Simulator: Pride and Prejudice
summary: Improve your word-guessing skills with this unique twist on Hangman! Guess sentences from Jane Austens Pride and Prejudice. Unlock audio clips and images with no way to lose! Immerse yourself in the greatest love story ever written. Who is a single man of large fortune? D_r_y

name: Jamp
summary: Jamp is a fast paced jump timing platformer. Solve the jumps and complete timed challenges to unlock sweet customizations and bragging rights.

name: Jackpot Crash Course
summary:
Jackpot Crash Course is a multi-chaptered casino-themed death game visual novel about crime, luck, and spectacle.

Against all odds, Eddie must take part in a game show starring only criminals and gamble against rival players to prove himself still worthy of being pardoned for his wrong deeds.

But is the show really about proving your innocence?

name: Jam's Adjustable Mirrors
summary: Harness sunlight and guide light beams by strategically placing and rotating various types of mirrors- all to power an elaborate jam-making operation!

name: Jawlah
summary:
Jawlah is a web-based interactive gaming platform that hosts a collection of quick, social mini-games designed for creators and their communities. Its not just one game, but a platform of multiple fast-paced multiplayer experiences, all playable directly from the browserno downloads or installations required.

Built specifically for live stream engagement, Jawlah allows viewers to join games instantly through chat commands. For example, during a live stream, participants can simply type !join in the chat to enter the next game round. This seamless integration turns passive viewers into active players in seconds.

Each game is designed to be short, fun, and community-driven, featuring formats like trivia, drawing battles, social deduction, and reaction-based challenges. Streamers can host spontaneous matches that keep their audiences entertained and connected throughout the broadcast.

name: Janitron
summary:
JANITRON is a fast-paced 2D arcade-style game.

Navigate each building and CLEAN UP.

name: Janky Golf with Stream
summary: A chaotic Twitch integrated mini golf game where your viewers control the shots. Design maps while Twitch chat aims, rotates, and swings using commands or the interactive extension.

name: Jacob Jazz's Tamarindo's Freaking Dinner
summary: Deliver the pizza. Escape the mansion. Dont become the dinner in this 90s mascot horror sandbox adventure trapped in a twisted time loop with 25 freaky endings!

name: Jabb
summary: Jabb is an action game where every weapon you see is a possibility if an enemy has it so can you. Play as this leaf thingy and dash through unique levels and fight some bosses.

name: Jaws: Retro Edition
summary:
This cant be! There has never been a Great White in these warm tropical waters before, NEVER! This is more than a coincidencethis shark appears to be possessedas if its hunting you down like its personal. Youd better prepare yourself and strike back before its too late.

Will you use the mini-sub, sea plane, sailboat, or just scuba gear? Perhaps it wont even matter. Remember, this is some kind of unbelievably powerful eating machine youre dealing with.

Quick, grab your weapons, pack your explosives, and check your maps. Its out thereyou know itand its coming for you. This is serious! This is the ultimate Jaws challenge, because this time its not over until only one of you is left alive.

name: Japanese Level Design Collab
summary: Japanese Level Design Collab is a collaborative Super Mario World rom hack made by 12 members of the Japanese Super Mario World rom hacking community, featuring 32 unique stages.

name: Japan Stigmatized Property 2
summary: Can you survive until dawn? Monitor real Japanese properties and report every anomaly. Miss too many and you will fail.

name: Jagar
summary: JAGAR is a minimalist 2D precision platformer where you control a rectangle through challenging levels filled with obstacles, precise jumps, and fast reflexes, perfect for quick sessions and hardcore challenges.

name: Jambredrek: Two Guns
summary: A first-person action-adventure set in the 1990s. Play as a corrupt police officer as you move through story-driven locations, investigate crime scenes, and make morally questionable choices.
